articles.description: Wes Burns has withdrawn from Wales' squad for the forthcoming European Championship play-offs because of a hamstring injury.

articles.description: Paula Badosa says it will be "uncomfortable" playing "best friend" Aryna Sabalenka this week, following the death of Sabalenka's boyfriend.

articles.description: Former Arsenal winger Paul Merson says football is "ravaged" with gambling and the bans given to Ivan Toney and Sandro Tonali are a "disgrace".
articles.title: Toney and Tonali gambling bans a disgrace - Merson

articles.description: As James Guy attempts to qualify for his third successive Olympics, he talks about his late ADHD diagnosis and coping with health anxiety.

articles.description: Two-time Grand Slam champion Simona Halep's first match back after a doping ban ends in a loss to Paula Badosa.

articles.description: England centre Manu Tuilagi will leave Sale Sharks at the end of the season to join French club Bayonne.

articles.description: Nikola Jokic scores 35 points as the Denver Nuggets survive a Minnesota Timberwolves comeback to win 115-112.
